results.content_en:
Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。
PPS (Require a New Bill Registration by "Billing Number")繳費靈*(必須以「繳費編號」登記賬單)

Please visit www.ppshk.com

請瀏覽 www.ppshk.com

Please dial 18031 (English) or 18033 (Cantonese)

You can make your payment by presenting Debit Note at any 7-Eleven Conveniences stores in
Hong Kong. Please present the QR code printed on the Debit Note for payment in cash. Please
retain the receipt for payment record.
Cheque Payment by Mail 郵寄支票 *
Please settle the premium and return this Debit Note with a cheque to us at: 28/F, One Island
East, 18 Westlands Road, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong.
Remarks: (1) Only accept HKD crossed cheque made payable to "Prudential General
Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write down the name of the Insured and the Policy
Number on the back of the cheque. (2) Only accept HKD cheque, cashier order or bank draft
which issued by Hong Kong banks. (3) Post-dated cheque is not accepted. (4) Please do not
send cash.
商戶編號
賬單類別
賬戶/客戶號碼
9228
11 (一般保險保費)
12(僱員福利保費)
請輸入12位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
閣下可攜同付款通知書,前往香港任何一間 7-Eleven 便利店,出示付款通知書上
的QR 碼以現金繳付保費。請保留收據作付款紀錄。
請繳付保費連同付款通知書及支票一併以郵遞方式寄往本公司,地址:香港鯽魚
涌華蘭路18 號港島東中心28樓。
注意事項:(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票
背面寫上保單投保人及保單號碼。(2)只接受本港銀行發出之港元支票、銀行本
票或匯票。(3)期票恕不獲接受。(4)請勿投寄現金。
Bank of China (BOC) Cheque Deposit Machine 中國銀行(香港)有限公司(「中銀香港」)「存支票機」*
You may make your payment by depositing crossed cheques in HKD issued by Hong Kong
banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保
單投保人姓名、保單編號及聯絡電話。(2)每張支票只限繳付一張保單的單項費
用。(3)請於「存支票機」輸入12位數字之繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)。(4)如
有關支票繳款未符合本公司規定,閣下可能因未能如期繳交費用而蒙受損失。
Note:
* Please allow 3 working days for payment processing. 請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。

12(僱員福利保費)
請輸入12位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
閣下可攜同付款通知書,前往香港任何一間 7-Eleven 便利店,出示付款通知書上
的QR 碼以現金繳付保費。請保留收據作付款紀錄。
請繳付保費連同付款通知書及支票一併以郵遞方式寄往本公司,地址:香港鯽魚
涌華蘭路18 號港島東中心28樓。
注意事項:(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票
背面寫上保單投保人及保單號碼。(2)只接受本港銀行發出之港元支票、銀行本
票或匯票。(3)期票恕不獲接受。(4)請勿投寄現金。
Bank of China (BOC) Cheque Deposit Machine 中國銀行(香港)有限公司(「中銀香港」)「存支票機」*
You may make your payment by depositing crossed cheques in HKD issued by Hong Kong
banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保
單投保人姓名、保單編號及聯絡電話。(2)每張支票只限繳付一張保單的單項費
用。(3)請於「存支票機」輸入12位數字之繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)。(4)如
有關支票繳款未符合本公司規定,閣下可能因未能如期繳交費用而蒙受損失。
Note:
* Please allow 3 working days for payment processing. 請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。

results.title_name_tc: 交銀信託提供之保單信託服務
results.content_en:
st application with Bank of Communications Trustee (thereafter
shortened as "BOCT")
b) Obtain confirmation with BOCT by issuing Trust Deeds, usually around 3 -4
weeks.
c) Agents will be notified by BOCT and should prepare the policy change form,
i.e. Beneficiary Appointment Form with Policyowner's signature to
Prudential accordingly, pending attachments as specified in item 3 below. The
workflow shall follow the existing practice as set forth by Life Administration.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)d) The required documents (see item 3 below) will be submitted by BOCT to Life
Administration and the Company reserves the right to call for additional
documents for incomplete cases.
e) Upon completion, Company will issue confirmation notices to the Policyowner
(with cc copy to agent).
f) Future correspondence will be sent to original Policyowner subsequent to the
confirmation as usual (as there is no change in policy ownership).
2. Minimum Requirement for setting up policy trust with BOCT
- By Sum Insured: Not less than HK$3 Million (including policy issued with
Prudential and other companies)
- By Assets: Not less than HK$3 Million (including cash value of policy and other
tangibles assets and properties)
- Discretion will be exercised by Bank of Communication Trustee if the above
amount is not met.
- Applying the usual practice of excluding US citizens from the purchase of
investment linked plan, the same restriction will be applied to the discretionary
beneficiaries as set out in the Trust, plus the exclusion for Japanese citizens for all
plans.
3. Documents required for submission to Life Administration
(in accordance with the best practice laid down in the guidance notes of OCI)
- Trust Deed containing Settlor name and beneficiaries name in full
- Relationship declaration of the beneficiaries as contained in the Trust Application
Form or any other supplementary sheet
- Nationality of the Settlor and the beneficiaries (US citizenship will be excluded
for linked policies, Japanese citizenship for all policies, see item 2 above)
4. Responsibilities
4.1 Agent's role
- Agent shall act a referrer and should play no active role in the trust application.
Agents are strongly advised not to give advice on the type of trust and the
consequence, and shall from time to time, refer the client to consult sales staff
from BOCT or their own lawyer if in doubt.
- Agent has NO obligation to sign as witness during the trust application.
- Agent can decide on his own whether to join the sales meeting with the service
provider or not.
- Agent has NO commission from Bank of Communication Trustee in any
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

results.content_en:
o sales hotlines (29058726 / 29058730) are specially made available by
BOCT for Prudential's agents. Agents can call the sales hotlines for
appointment booking, case preliminary assessment, technical support and
general enquiry. After the sale meeting, BOCT will collect the following
information and documents if the client decides to proceed with establishment
of a policy trust:
a. Copies of Settlor and Beneficiaries' Identification Documents (e.g. HKID
or passport)
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)b. Address Proof (e.g. utility bill or bank statement)
c. Copy of Insurance Policy (not compulsory to be provided at the sales
meeting)
d. Correspondence
Address and Contact Information
Beneficiaries)
(Settlor and
e. Trust Name (e.g. The Chan Tai Man Family Trust)
4.4 Customers' role (Know Your Customer issue and disclosure)
- Customers need to observe the disclosure rule regarding the requirement as set out
in item 3 above.
- Customers need to disclose for the purpose of ongoing monitoring, see item 5.
5. Ongoing Monitoring
According to the guidance notes of OCI, the Company has the responsibility to
monitor changes of beneficiary after the setting up of trust including:
- Change of citizenship from i) non US to US and ii) non Japanese to Japanese
nationality for the Settlor and named beneficiaries during the life of policy.
- Change of beneficiaries including relationship change during the life of policy.
Note:
BOCT will be responsible for reporting to Prudential from time to time (using
disclaimer during their sales process and provide training with BOCT's supporting
staff). In case of non-reporting of the change of non US to US citizen for beneficiary
due to negligence, both BOCT and Prudential will be liable to legal suit by the US
government on tax issue.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

results.content_en:
er and withdrawal of cash value within the first 5 policy years. 以下提取費用適用於首5個

PAIPPW0401Part 1 第一部分 Policy Surrender / Withdrawal of Cash Value 退保/提取現金價值指示
I understand and consent that after deducting all other relevant redemption charges as listed above (if applicable), the surrender value / policy account value
will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further
understand that the MVA, when applied, reduces the surrender value / policy account value to reflect the market value movement
of the underlying assets of the captioned policy. 本人明白及同意在扣除上表所列之提取費用後(如適用),退保價值/保單戶口價值須減去有關
市場價值調整金額,該金額將以保誠收到此完全填妥表格及相關文件當日之百分比計算;本人並明白保誠行使市場價值調整將會調低
退保價值/保單戶口價值,從而反映有關保單旗下資產的變動。
Requested Effective Date # :
要求生效日期:
Day 日
/
/
Month 月
Year年
# Leave this blank unless you have specific request on the effective date of
change. Prudential shall have the right to determine the effective date of
change upon acceptance of the Application. 如對更改生效日期沒有特別
要求,不用填寫此欄。於接受更改申請時,保誠有權決定更改之
生效日期。
Withdraw Cash Value of Policy Account (Cheque Amount) 提取保單戶口現金價值(支票金額)
USD/HKD 美元 /港元
Surrender 退保
Reason for Surrender (Please choose ONE appropriate answer) 申請退保原因(請選擇一個最適當的答案)
Change in Insurance needs 保險需求有所改變
Change in financial condition 財務狀況改變
Replaced by another insurance plan 以其他保險產品取代
Returns below expectations 保單回報未如理想
Coverage not comprehensive 保障不夠全面
Payment tenor is too long 付款期過長
Urgent need of Money 急需用錢
Lost confidence in the economy and future 對前景及經濟失去信心
Residing overseas 移居外地
Other Reason 其他理由
Unwilling to disclose reason 不願意披露理由
Part 2 第二部分 Payment Instruction 付款指示
1. All payments would be issued by cheque and in the name of the policyowner. For policy with collateral assignment, please state the payee of the cheque.
所有款項將以支票直接給予保單持有人。如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票抬頭人。
2. If no payment option is selected, payment will be issued in HKD cheque. 如沒有選擇付款方式,款項會以港元支票簽發。
3. The cheque will be posted to the policyowner's correspondence address in Prudential's by registered mail, unless otherwise specify in the "Delivery Option"
below. 除在以下註明遞交方式,支票將會以掛號形式郵寄到保單持有人在保誠記錄上的通訊地址。
4. If the policyowner selects to collect the cheque at a branch of Standard Chartered Bank (Hong Kong) Limited (SCB) or at our Customer Service Centre(CSC),
please specify the SCB branch code, or the CSC location and policyowner's contact number. 如選擇到渣打銀行(香港)有限公司分行或本公司客戶
服務中心領取,請註明分行編號,或客戶服務中心地點及保單持有人聯絡號碼。
Payment Option 付款方式
HKD Cheque 港元支票
(Applicable to USD / HKD Policy 適用於美元及港元保單)
Local USD Cheque 本地美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)
Overseas USD Cheque 海外美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)
For Policy with collateral assignee, please state the payee of the cheque 如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票收款人

Collateral Assignee 抵押轉讓之承讓人

Posted to Policyowner's correspondence address in our record. 郵寄到保單持有人在本公司記錄上的通訊地址

results.content_en:
Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。
PPS (Require a New Bill Registration by "Billing Number")繳費靈*(必須以「繳費編號」登記賬單)

Please visit www.ppshk.com

請瀏覽 www.ppshk.com

Please dial 18031 (English) or 18033 (Cantonese)

請致電 18031 (英語)或18033(粤語)

Number is 9)
賬單號碼

Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額

Our Merchant Code

12 (Employee Benefit Premium)
Bill / Account Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
Cash in 7-Eleven (if applicable) 到 7-11 便利店以現金支付(如適用)
You can make your payment by presenting Debit Note at any 7-Eleven Conveniences stores in
Hong Kong. Please present the QR code printed on the Debit Note for payment in cash. Please
retain the receipt for payment record.
Cheque Payment by Mail 郵寄支票 *
Please settle the premium and return this Debit Note with a cheque to us at: 28/F, One Island
East, 18 Westlands Road, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong.
Remarks: (1) Only accept HKD crossed cheque made payable to "Prudential General
Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write down the name of the Insured and the Policy
Number on the back of the cheque. (2) Only accept HKD cheque, cashier order or bank draft
which issued by Hong Kong banks. (3) Post-dated cheque is not accepted. (4) Please do not
send cash.
商戶編號
賬單類別
賬戶/客戶號碼
9228
11 (一般保險保費)
12(僱員福利保費)
請輸入12位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
閣下可攜同付款通知書,前往香港任何一間 7-Eleven 便利店,出示付款通知書上
的QR 碼以現金繳付保費。請保留收據作付款紀錄。
請繳付保費連同付款通知書及支票一併以郵遞方式寄往本公司,地址:香港鯽魚
涌華蘭路18 號港島東中心28樓。
注意事項:(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票
背面寫上保單投保人及保單號碼。(2)只接受本港銀行發出之港元支票、銀行本
票或匯票。(3)期票恕不獲接受。(4)請勿投寄現金。
Bank of China (BOC) Cheque Deposit Machine 中國銀行(香港)有限公司(「中銀香港」)「存支票機」*
You may make your payment by depositing crossed cheques in HKD issued by Hong Kong
banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保
單投保人姓名、保單編號及聯絡電話。(2)每張支票只限繳付一張保單的單項費
用。(3)請於「存支票機」輸入12位數字之繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)。(4)如
有關支票繳款未符合本公司規定,閣下可能因未能如期繳交費用而蒙受損失。
Note:
* Please allow 3 working days for payment processing. 請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。

票或匯票。(3)期票恕不獲接受。(4)請勿投寄現金。
Bank of China (BOC) Cheque Deposit Machine 中國銀行(香港)有限公司(「中銀香港」)「存支票機」*
You may make your payment by depositing crossed cheques in HKD issued by Hong Kong
banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保
單投保人姓名、保單編號及聯絡電話。(2)每張支票只限繳付一張保單的單項費
用。(3)請於「存支票機」輸入12位數字之繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)。(4)如
有關支票繳款未符合本公司規定,閣下可能因未能如期繳交費用而蒙受損失。
Note:
* Please allow 3 working days for payment processing. 請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。

results.content_chunk:
Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。

will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further
understand that the MVA, when applied, reduces the surrender value / policy account value to reflect the market value movement
of the underlying assets of the captioned policy. 本人明白及同意在扣除上表所列之提取費用後(如適用),退保價值/保單戶口價值須減去有關
市場價值調整金額,該金額將以保誠收到此完全填妥表格及相關文件當日之百分比計算;本人並明白保誠行使市場價值調整將會調低

results.content_en:
o sales hotlines (29058726 / 29058730) are specially made available by
BOCT for Prudential's agents. Agents can call the sales hotlines for
appointment booking, case preliminary assessment, technical support and
general enquiry. After the sale meeting, BOCT will collect the following
information and documents if the client decides to proceed with establishment
of a policy trust:
a. Copies of Settlor and Beneficiaries' Identification Documents (e.g. HKID
or passport)
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)b. Address Proof (e.g. utility bill or bank statement)
c. Copy of Insurance Policy (not compulsory to be provided at the sales
meeting)
d. Correspondence
Address and Contact Information
Beneficiaries)
(Settlor and
e. Trust Name (e.g. The Chan Tai Man Family Trust)
4.4 Customers' role (Know Your Customer issue and disclosure)
- Customers need to observe the disclosure rule regarding the requirement as set out
in item 3 above.
- Customers need to disclose for the purpose of ongoing monitoring, see item 5.
5. Ongoing Monitoring
According to the guidance notes of OCI, the Company has the responsibility to
monitor changes of beneficiary after the setting up of trust including:
- Change of citizenship from i) non US to US and ii) non Japanese to Japanese
nationality for the Settlor and named beneficiaries during the life of policy.
- Change of beneficiaries including relationship change during the life of policy.
Note:
BOCT will be responsible for reporting to Prudential from time to time (using
disclaimer during their sales process and provide training with BOCT's supporting
staff). In case of non-reporting of the change of non US to US citizen for beneficiary
due to negligence, both BOCT and Prudential will be liable to legal suit by the US
government on tax issue.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

results.content_en:
Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。
PPS (Require a New Bill Registration by "Billing Number")繳費靈*(必須以「繳費編號」登記賬單)
PPS By Internet
Please visit www.ppshk.com
繳費靈網上服務
請瀏覽 www.ppshk.com
PPS By Phone
Please dial 18031 (English) or 18033 (Cantonese)
繳費靈電話服務
請致電 18031 (英語)或18033(粤語)
Our Merchant Code
6555
商戶編號
6555
Bill Type
01 (General Insurance)
02 (Group Medical)
賬單類別
01(一般保險)
02(團體醫療)
Bill Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
賬單號碼
請輸入 12 位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
ATM (JETCO) 銀通櫃員機*
Our Merchant Code
9228
Bill Type
11 (General Insurance Premium)
12 (Employee Benefit Premium)
Bill / Account Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
Cash in 7-Eleven (if applicable) 到 7-11 便利店以現金支付(如適用)
You can make your payment by presenting Debit Note at any 7-Eleven Conveniences stores in
Hong Kong. Please present the QR code printed on the Debit Note for payment in cash. Please
retain the receipt for payment record.
Cheque Payment by Mail 郵寄支票 *
Please settle the premium and return this Debit Note with a cheque to us at: 28/F, One Island
East, 18 Westlands Road, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong.
Remarks: (1) Only accept HKD crossed cheque made payable to "Prudential General
Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write down the name of the Insured and the Policy
Number on the back of the cheque. (2) Only accept HKD cheque, cashier order or bank draft
which issued by Hong Kong banks. (3) Post-dated cheque is not accepted. (4) Please do not
send cash.
商戶編號
賬單類別
賬戶/客戶號碼
9228
11 (一般保險保費)
12(僱員福利保費)
請輸入12位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
閣下可攜同付款通知書,前往香港任何一間 7-Eleven 便利店,出示付款通知書上
的QR 碼以現金繳付保費。請保留收據作付款紀錄。
請繳付保費連同付款通知書及支票一併以郵遞方式寄往本公司,地址:香港鯽魚
涌華蘭路18 號港島東中心28樓。
注意事項:(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票
背面寫上保單投保人及保單號碼。(2)只接受本港銀行發出之港元支票、銀行本
票或匯票。(3)期票恕不獲接受。(4)請勿投寄現金。
Bank of China (BOC) Cheque Deposit Machine 中國銀行(香港)有限公司(「中銀香港」)「存支票機」*
You may make your payment by depositing crossed cheques in HKD issued by Hong Kong
banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保
單投保人姓名、保單編號及聯絡電話。(2)每張支票只限繳付一張保單的單項費
用。(3)請於「存支票機」輸入12位數字之繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)。(4)如
有關支票繳款未符合本公司規定,閣下可能因未能如期繳交費用而蒙受損失。
Note:
* Please allow 3 working days for payment processing. 請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。

Part 2
第二部分 Payment Amount & Method 繳款金額及方法
1. HKD policies only accept HKD payment. For non-HKD policies, payments can be made in either the policy currency or HKD.If you wish to
make payment in MOP, the transaction amount will be converted into equivalent amount of HKD at the prevailing exchange rate on the
transaction date for settlement. Your payments in HKD for foreign currency policies may be subject to change in view of exchange rate
market fluctuation, and you should be aware of the exchange rate risks. You may need to pay any shortfall in the premium to maintain
your coverage without being affected if there is any discrepancy in premium due to exchange rate fluctuations. Any overpayment of
premium will be credited to the premium deposit account. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing
exchange rate in different currencies.港元保單只接受以港元付款;非港元保單接受以港元或保單貨幣付款。如 閣下希望以澳門元繳付費用,付款金額
會以交易當日之匯率兌換為等值的港元以作結算。以港元繳交外幣保單的繳款可能會因應匯率市場波動而有所變動,您應留意匯率風險。如因匯率波動而造成
繳費不足,您或需補交保費差額以維持您的保障不受影響;多繳保費將會存入至保費儲蓄戶口。請瀏覽 prudential.com.hk/exchange-rate-macs 以獲取
不同貨幣的現行匯率。
2. If payment was made by credit / debit card / telegraphic transfer and there is subsequently a refund, such refund will be directly credited
to the credit card account holder / bank account holder / remitter (as the case may be). Any handling charge or exchange rate difference
arising from such refund will be borne by credit / debit cardholder / bank account holder / remitter. 如以信用卡/借記卡/電匯繳款而其後發生
退款,該退款將直接退回予信用卡卡主/借記卡卡主/匯款人之賬戶內(視乎情況而定)。信用卡公司/發卡機構在收款及退款時徵收之手續費或使用不同匯率而產
生之外匯差額將由信用卡/借記卡卡主/匯款人承擔。
3. If the third party payment is over HKD200,000 equivalent, a copy of the identity card / passport / travel document of the Third Party
Payor must be submitted. 如第三者付款為超過 200,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交身份證/護照/旅行證件之副本。
4. If the third party payment is over HKD 500,000 equivalent, a copy of the relationship proof such as marriage certificate/birth
certificate/household register must be submitted to verify the relationship between Third Party Payor and Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured. 如第三者付款為超過 500,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交關係證明文件如結婚證書/出世紙/內地戶口證明文件之副
本以核實第三者付款人與投保人/保單持有人/受保人的關係。
5. The maximum amount of cash payment that is accepted at Cashier is HKD120,000/USD15,000(or equivalent) per payment installment
per policy. 於繳費處以現金繳費,每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為120,000 港元/15,000 美元(或等值)。

Part 2
第二部分 Payment Amount & Method 繳款金額及方法
1. HKD policies only accept HKD payment. For non-HKD policies, payments can be made in either the policy currency or HKD.If you wish to
make payment in MOP, the transaction amount will be converted into equivalent amount of HKD at the prevailing exchange rate on the
transaction date for settlement. Your payments in HKD for foreign currency policies may be subject to change in view of exchange rate
market fluctuation, and you should be aware of the exchange rate risks. You may need to pay any shortfall in the premium to maintain
your coverage without being affected if there is any discrepancy in premium due to exchange rate fluctuations. Any overpayment of
premium will be credited to the premium deposit account. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing
exchange rate in different currencies.港元保單只接受以港元付款;非港元保單接受以港元或保單貨幣付款。如 閣下希望以澳門元繳付費用,付款金額
會以交易當日之匯率兌換為等值的港元以作結算。以港元繳交外幣保單的繳款可能會因應匯率市場波動而有所變動,您應留意匯率風險。如因匯率波動而造成
繳費不足,您或需補交保費差額以維持您的保障不受影響;多繳保費將會存入至保費儲蓄戶口。請瀏覽 prudential.com.hk/exchange-rate-macs 以獲取
不同貨幣的現行匯率。
2. If payment was made by credit / debit card / telegraphic transfer and there is subsequently a refund, such refund will be directly credited
to the credit card account holder / bank account holder / remitter (as the case may be). Any handling charge or exchange rate difference
arising from such refund will be borne by credit / debit cardholder / bank account holder / remitter. 如以信用卡/借記卡/電匯繳款而其後發生
退款,該退款將直接退回予信用卡卡主/借記卡卡主/匯款人之賬戶內(視乎情況而定)。信用卡公司/發卡機構在收款及退款時徵收之手續費或使用不同匯率而產
生之外匯差額將由信用卡/借記卡卡主/匯款人承擔。
3. If the third party payment is over HKD200,000 equivalent, a copy of the identity card / passport / travel document of the Third Party
Payor must be submitted. 如第三者付款為超過 200,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交身份證/護照/旅行證件之副本。
4. If the third party payment is over HKD 500,000 equivalent, a copy of the relationship proof such as marriage certificate/birth
certificate/household register must be submitted to verify the relationship between Third Party Payor and Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured. 如第三者付款為超過 500,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交關係證明文件如結婚證書/出世紙/內地戶口證明文件之副
本以核實第三者付款人與投保人/保單持有人/受保人的關係。
5. The maximum amount of cash payment that is accepted at Cashier is HKD120,000/USD15,000(or equivalent) per payment installment
per policy. 於繳費處以現金繳費,每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為120,000 港元/15,000 美元(或等值)。
